content.detailedDescription: This is a report for an aunt of mine that is deceased. she worked as a reservationist for twa. it happened about november, 1985. at christmas she spoke about what she saw, and was very upset and unnerved. she came down her street from work, pulled in her driveway. as she started to get out of her car she noticed 3 very small blue beings walking across the street toward her house. they continued to walk between her house and the neighbors house toward the back yards- not fenced. she observed that they were blue in color, very small- about 3' high, they stayed together and walked to the back. she said she was so distraught, she just went into her house, and did not follow them to see where they went. she passed away in 2008, i asked her about this event before she died, and she said it absolutely happened, and she was never able to forget what she saw. no lights, no craft-- just these 3 small beings.I am her niece, and felt compelled to report what she told our entire family. i have used my aunt's address, so you have the correct location. i live  at a different address in  the same town with my spouse. you have my phone numbers.
content.summary: My aunt saw 3 blueish 3' high beings, as she pulled into her driveway , coming home from work. they were crossing her street and went between her house and neighbors , she did not get out of her car.  no craft, just 3 blue people like beings.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a jetliner headed east as a few of my co-workers were having our safety meeting and i saw what i believed was a star because of its brilliance but after watching it for a few minutes i noticed that the space between the jet and object did not change,it was as if the object was perfecly pacing this jet about 1/4mile ahead of it at the nose in the same direction as the plane after a couple of minutes or so the bright object flashed shot up and in an instant it disappears...Sincely tom
content.summary: I noticed a commercial airliner headed east over pecos tx when i saw what i thought was a star but it was at pace with the jets nose about 1/4mile ahead of it for about two to three minutes  and and in a flash it climbed altitude and vanished .

content.detailedDescription:
I dont care if this sounds crazy. when i was very young i believe i was visited by small aliens with large black eyes. i thought they were ghosts and it was a dream/nightmare. they wer so short, and my room so dark i could only see they were light colored, dark eyes, their mouths were opened in an "o" shape and they had skinny arms that moved so fat they were blurred. i was hovering next to my twin bed above the ground at bed level and they were performing what i thought to be an operation of some sort over my torso. i could move nothing but my eyes and could not scream. my room was so dark then i passed out.

at approx 3:15am this morning i started dreaming about them. i never dream about them unless they are close by. at first they were all over the audience in a concert by some 80's rock type band. then when i saw them all in hoods this time i ran but could not escape. then i found myself in a darkened neighborhood. no street lights on, no lights from houses, everything darkened except for what appeared to be a bright star directly over me illuminating my area where i was standing and some exteriors of darkened houses. then i felt like it came closer and closer and suddenly i was in my current room. lying in the exact position i was lying in and unable to open my eyes or move and they were in my room between the bed and the window. my bed is about 2 feet from the window wall. there were multiple and in the dark a green flash came from the corner wall where my feet were. and i could feel an energy source what i would describe as pulling my body but not moving me . it did not hurt. more like an intense internal tickling but not so tickly. dont know how to describe it. it jus was. i dont know what the hell they wee doing but they were in my room again almost 40 years later. i believe the dream preceded what was really happening. i could not wake up but was able to eventually wake myself up and did not stay passed out this time until morning. i could not sleep and checked the clock it was just about 3:30am. i woke up my son and made him get in bed with me. hes just 13. i didnt want them effing with him. his room is way darker and secluded. i fell back to sleep about 4:15am with a light strip on and my son beside me. they came back with him in the room at some point after and i could see it all but could not move or get myself up this time i was paralyzed and could see them in the glow of the strip light coming from my floor. they were on that side of the bed again near my son. i fought it and eventually forced my way up in bed. then they were gone. i had a sense that i felt they wee harrassing me at that point. what ever that could mean ! they were singing a weird song in my head. "we missed you, we really really really really missed you". f weird. maybe i dreamt the song part but if anyone knows what its like to be visited , when they are near your dreams will suddenly shift to incorporate them , then somewhere along the line you wake to understand the experience you are having with them is real and you crossed over the blur of your dreams into what is happening current. weird s---. i know it all sounds weird and fake but this is true. and though they have not visited me that im aware for about 40 years , over the years when they are near (flying over) i feel like i can sense that and then i dream of them. but they were in my f room i saw and felt it all.
content.summary: I saw what i thought was a star shining light down n a dark neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading north on corey street in yellow springs after getting out of a movie when i lights in the sky caught my eye. i assumed it was an airplane as there is both very small & larger airports nearby. i couldn't look away, however, and noticed that the lights had a colored affectation to them and they weren't blinking. it was mostly green, two green lights flanking a centered orange light. 
i was still convinced it was a plane until i realized it had stopped moving just above the tree line, hovering by sight right above the street light nearest to me. it looked to be at the same elevation as an airplane would. 
just in case, i figured i'd report it. if it was a plane, it was one like i've never seen before (which could be quite possible).
content.summary: Orange centered light flanked by two green lights

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

i reside in the souther part of chandler, arizona. on the evening of 11-7-15, my spouse and i went outside to leave for the grocery store. upon leaving, i noticed a greenish haze off into the western sky. there were not any stars out and this was very clear and unusual.In this greenish haze were aircraft circling around something which was not able to be seen with naked eye.. i tried to video record this, however had no luck. i then started taking photos and noticed a disc shaped object in the haze which looked like it was emerging from some sort of greenish teal light. the disc had 7 lights which were very visable and it was clearly some sort of craft. the object hovered for about 4-5 min then took off to a much higher elevation.  i then contacted the local news here but they referred me to this site. the photos that have been posted on the media are not clear and frankly don't show anything. i just want people to see what was really in thr sky that evening.
content.summary: I saw greenish haze and light source in sky circled by aircraft. i tried to take video and no luck. took photos and the object was very clear. it hovered then took off to  higher elevation and the aircraft followed.

content.detailedDescription: It was night time and i had just picked up my friend from her house. we were driving through her neighborhood when we both happend to look up at the sky and witness a bright, neon green object quickly go across the sky in straight line before disappearing before it reached the horizon. we only saw it for a split second but we definitely both saw it.
content.summary: Was driving with friend when we spotted a neon green object fly across the sky and disappear

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog on the side of my house.  i heard a low tone buzzing noise.  i thought to my self that it was the power lines. when i was thinking this i said to my self in my head "since when are power line that loud, i never hear that before." i went to look up at the power line and that is when i noticed the object.   i thought either military drone or ufo because it was to big to be a regular drone that anyone could buy.  when i looked up and noticed the object it was directly above me.  it was fairly close, because it looked rather big.  i would say about 500-800 feet if that.  it was triangular in shape and had 3 white light on each corner and 1 red/orange light not directly in the middle, but closer to the white light on the tip.  i looked at it for about 5 seconds, then i looked to my dog to see if she felt anything because dogs can sense things humans can't.  she just stared at me and at that second there was a huge flash.  it was like a camera flash.  i didn't know what it was, i just took off running with my dog to get to safety in my house.  it took about 10 seconds to get in my house.  i got my mom to look out side which took about 10 seconds.  in total about 20-30 seconds since the flash.  we looked outside on our porch and it was already across the sky where we could hardly see it.  my feelings during the encounter was bewilderment.  when the flash happened i was scared for me and my dog.  but after i was excited because i have always believed in ufo's and aliens and i feel a very strong connection to space and wanting to know more.  the next night i was looking in the sky for it again and i saw the same exact thing again but it was very high up and i couldn't hear anything.  this time it was going in the opposite direction from the night before.
content.summary: Triangle object with low tone buzz sound.  3 white lights on corners and 1 red light in middle.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in bed with my girlfriend when she jumped up to look out the window. she had me come look and it was this bizarre orange/red glowing light traveling pretty quickly at a low altitude. i'm guessing 500 yards above the houses. no blinking, absolutely no sound. we ran to another room to continue watching then finally ran outside and watched it until i couldn't see it anymore. it was traveling east/north east. i immediately checked the weather and the wind was traveling in the opposite direction. i already knew this wasn't a chinese lantern but the wind report confirmed that. this was a flying object that was unlike anything either of us have ever seen. i've seen many types of low flying aircraft including a b2 bomber. i'm prior military and this thing did not have any regulatory lights of any kind.
content.summary: Orange/red sphere traveling quickly at low altitude over me neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
Went out on my second floor deck to have a smoke and seen what looked like a cylinder shape or cigar shape, glowing dull white, moving fast north to south.  as it came closer i could see that it was not one large shape, but 9 smaller lights (for lack of a better word) close together.  as is sped across the sky, 3 of the lights seemed to shift locations and formed a perfect triangle shape with the others.  i watched it until it went over my house, then ran downstairs and out the front to watch it move out of my site line.  now, i know it sounds crazy, i'm still trying to wrap my head around it, but my house is right under a major flight path to the airport, i see and hear 15+ planes of all sizes everyday.  i'm only blocks away from a major hospital, and to the highway, so helicopters are every 20 minuets.  this was none of these.  the speed and maneuvers seemed impossible.  i wish i could explain it better.  the light seemed dull white, like it was shining thru clouds, but the sky was clear with stars visible.  i'm not good at judging distances, but it was close, and their was no sound, none.  if i compared it to the  plans going over my house to land, it may have been twice as high in the sky, and moving ten times as fast. as i stated before, i'm still trying to understand what i saw.  i don't know the exact time, for sure between 630pm and 730pm.  i don't know how long i stood their trying to decipher what i just saw after it went out of my view.  i wasn't even sure i wanted to tell my wife, even after she asked me why i was running thru the house.  i even had to take some time before i decided to find out how to make such a report.  i hope this is taken serious, because i'm really confused and would like to know some answers if their are any. please.
thank you for your time

j.B.
content.summary: Saw a cigar shape glowing and moving fast turn into a triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: Ok, i was watching the night sky with my night vision device when i noticed 2 bright objects moving slowly across the night sky then soon i realized it was 3 ufos in a triangular formation and after a couple of minutes a fourth ufo got too close to the formation and then they started to glow really bright i was able to see them with my own eyes and it was an amazing sight to see. i uploaded the video on youtube just type in "huge triangular ufo formation-amazing!!!" and you'll see it. after that sighting i was able to record more ufo traveling in pairs , i mean it was a very active night.
content.summary: Huge triangular ufo formation 11-10-15

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on i-75, seen a black disc flying north above fields and wooded area. moved up and down very quick, then took off or hid.
content.summary: Black disc

content.detailedDescription: Campamento salinas, en evento nocturno cuando derrepente vi una luz que cruzo hacia la playa y cuando crei que cayo o aterrizo emitio una fuerte luz que como se genero, desaparecio, parece como.Si nadie mas lo hubiese visto excepto a algun otro ni√±o como.Yo en aquel momento
content.summary: Vi una luz que cruzo hacia la playa y cuando crei que cayo o aterrizo emitio una luz y al parecer nadie mas la vio

content.detailedDescription: Saw triangle ufo a few miles south of me.  got a close up view of the flying object through a gun scope and it was triangle shaped with at least 2 bright lights.  it would move  northwest then stop suddenly and also move left to right.  did this for about an hour until it was out of view.  could see in the scope it would also turn from a horizontal position to vertical then back to horizontal
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in our hot tub as we normally do at night, my girlfriend and i were enjoying a cold november night under the milky way. there was absolutely zero cloud cover. i am obsessed with aviation, a paragliding pilot, and work at our local airport. i can readily pick out conventional aircraft during any time of the day. i can recognize aviation lights and determine direction of flight. 

all that being said, we were in the hot tub. i looked up in the northern sky at about 45+ degrees from horizon. i witnessed a bright larger than normal star appear and then disappear. i had enough time to say, "what was that?" my girlfriend said, "what was what?" i said, " i don't know, i saw a light turn on and then turn off!" "it was like a large star. it turned on! then turned off! right there in the sky!" right when i finished saying all of that it happened again and she saw it.

now, i do believe in ufo's et. but, this couldn't be explained away. was it an aircraft. no! no visible navigation lights were seen at that instant as we saw many prior and after. also, this object wasn't moving. was it a satellite. no! again, there was no flight path and it never reappeared in the clear night sky. the only thing it could have been was two separate shooting stars traveling perfectly straight at us. i am no rocket scientist, but that would be impossible. that argument would mean there would have to be a second one traveling the exact trajectory, burn time, and color for my lady to witness the same thing. 

one last thing, three hours prior while at the barn. we saw two military re-fueling jets @ 20k feet flying to the north along the same path where the stationary lights appeared. it was like someone from far away took a picture with a flash, but due to the distance it appeared as a single light source. a large star. 

hope there are other accounts to provide an explanation.
content.summary: A bright star "turned on" then "turned off"

content.detailedDescription: I was scouting in the leather camp public forest for a few good hunting spots before the season. at the same time i practice a few survival skills. i spent most of my day in the woods and decided to start walking back because the sun was setting soon and i had close to a half mile before i would get to  my car. i walked out and it was still light out. i began driving west on martin brother road. i drove maybe a mile. there is a long horn ranch i always look at as i go by because it's just really nice place. as i looked to my left i could see above the trees a hovering dull gray craft.I was excited to see it. my car was still moving forward and i could not see it anymore so when i reached the ranchers driveway i turned around.Hopefully to watch it a little longer. when i looked in the same spot it was already gone. real disappointed it was gone but at least i had the chance to see this un explainable sighting. i again turned toward home. when i arrived home i felt as if i was in shock over my short but clear sighting. i didn't know if i should talk to my wife and kids about it or not.I did and i was happy they believed me. they know that i'm an honest person.I can't stop thinking about this craft since. i was a sceptic and now i dint sure what to think. i should probably talk to someone that really is more involved in this phenomenon.
content.summary: There was a hovering dull gray ufo just over tree top near a large long horn cattle ranch.

content.detailedDescription: I left my house when i heard a humming noise i looked up and saw what looked like a huge diamond it glowed like nothing ive ever seen before at first i thought it was a star then i realized it started to move and that's when i started to think it was a reality shock for me my step brother and sister saw it too at first they didn't believe me until they saw it move they went into panic i didn't i felt like they were there to watch over me and the people around me to understand them but that's when it started to go faster north i saw what looked like some kind of boosters on the back of it then it vanished.
content.summary: I was shocked to see this because ive seen lots of ufos but this one looked like a diamond

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday night i was sitting on my back porch with my mom when i saw a huge flashing object in the sky. i thought it was a plane because of the flashing and felt myself waiting for it to move. it never moved. it stayed in the same exact spot for over 45 minutes flashing so fast it hurt my eyes to keep staring. i started recording. i did not feel right about what i saw. i couldn't find a explanation for what it could be. my dad who saw it with his own eyes works for nasa he told me it had to be a ufo. i stayed outside as long as i could and then went back inside. i came back out 20 minutes later and it was gone. this is the first sighting i saw on saturday night. i have been obsessing about it ever since. i thought to myself who ever really looks out into the sky at night? i've lived at this address for almost 6 months now and have never really looked. last night it came back but it was two different objects: another circle flashing the same but sitting above the clouds and way higher. this time it was moving like crazy. i started recording but my camera stated to twitch (it never has before) that's what freaked me out the most. it would not let me record any longer. what i was recording was the same thing i saw on saturday night but it was going back up into the sky so fast my camera couldn't keep up. i waited a hour and looked again it was back blending in like a star but way higher this time and on the opposite side of the sky. again i live next to a cow pasture and on a wildlife preservation. i have to find out what this is and what it is doing. it's watching something.

the first time i saw it , it was super low to the ground. maybe about 50 feet above my street light but last night it was way far up sitting above the clouds. i wouldn't have even noticed if i didn't know what to look for.
content.summary: For 45 minutes a huge flashing circle was above my house hovering, i live in front of a field and by a cow pasture

content.detailedDescription: Driving us24west, looked toward mtns, observed square somewhat flat object with 4 bright lights on bottom which changed colors when object turned and reversed direction at high rate of speed and dissappeared.Took place in front of mtn range toward pikes peak in woodland pk. co.  viewing time approximately 2-5 secs.
content.summary: Observed object scaling mtns as background on us24west(pikes peak), woodland,co

content.detailedDescription: Overlooking melbourne city on the balcony i saw 10 white object flying across the sky all together at the same speed, soon as i saw them i knew as it looked like a ufo fleet i've seem on utube before. they moved slowly across the sky i watched them for around 5 mins, my gf also saw them. they were above the clouds and also move individually. so bizare i took video but when i play it you can't see anything either was too bright or too high. amazing!
content.summary: Ten white object flew aross the sky slowly moved together but also individually

content.detailedDescription:
While taking my dog outside, i noticed a bright bulb of bright yellow and orange light.  after i let the dog back inside, i wanted to stay and investigate what it was.  i'd seen something similar earlier in october and wanted to see if this ufo would behave likewise.  after a few seconds, it did.  it hovered, then dropped very suddenly, then moved back up, then resume hovering.  it would then do strange pulls and turns toward other directions, but always seemed to move back to its original position.  

i also seemed to notice a very faint light far above it, whether it was another ufo i can't say, but it seemed to react slightly to it.  after a few minutes, it pulsed some kind of thin steam or aura of wispy fog, in accordance to this other faint light pulsing.  afterwards, it didn't seem to behave beyond simply pulling bizarre turns and returning to its center position.

i've never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Radiant bright disk ufo

content.detailedDescription: Triangle shaped craft... also a circle like craft with many lights
content.summary: I have pictures u tell me... multiple craft types

content.detailedDescription:
On june 17, 2015 around 1:30 a.M. what appeared like my son burst open locked back garage door in to kitchen where i was sweeping. i said have you been out jogging? i said this because my son appeared to be dripping wet yet it was not raining outside.  he didn't say a word. put his head to my head and i was out cold. lost track of time. was out of it. my son actually did get home around 6:30 or 7:00 a.M on june 17, 2015. got in trouble at work for no call no show.  boss complained that i kept forgetting things and stop acting like a retard.  unlike him.  so, i went to near by hospital er for a check up on june 20, 2015.  they said i was fine.

but, i just knew something wasn't right.  so i reviewed all phone messages. videos and pictures.By the way my sons phone stopped working that night then got lost altogether.  

i had called son to see if he was ok at the precise moment the entity burst in.  so i heard what should have been a voicemail message. recording has since changed, then vanished.  i still have bits and pieces of it.  but not what i heard on the original.

original voicemail message:

crash door opening.  me: have you been out jogging? then: falling struggleing dog barked a few times.

entity: said my name three times in a growling garble voice that sounded just like the one in the movie forth encounters with that supermodel in it mia poltovich (can't spell her name) also heard frequencies like someone trying to tune in a radio.  all that recording has vanished.  now all you can hear is me; have you been out jogging? struggling, sniffling like i had a runny nose and dog barking..

my phone video:  shows an entity with a big nose and scraggly hair doing something to me (blowing gas or operating on me as i'm coming back in to conscienceness)  i saw: why is that woman screaming? (i believe a video (the devils reject was playing in the living room) entity backs up quickly on moves off to my right.  at first it looks like a man, but when i print off a picture it looks like a big nosed entity resembling that charachter in that tv show in the 80's called alf.

i have another video of something making a growling noise.  will try to send it to.  it took months in my free time to print even a picture of this thing. videos will not send, print, turn green screen etc. phone kept saying it doesn't support that file type or extension.  started with an e
 like eix.

when my son arrived home everything was normal.  didn't remember a thing and wouldn't have even bothered checking in to the events of june 17 if i hadn't almost lost my job due to absent mindedness that week.

went to hospital again with stomach pains. as i do have a hernia.  more test were run in more detail. as i was came in on a ambulance and was admitted to hospitaql for 3 days.  a few odd things did show up which i'm still researching, requesting records and x rays.  

1. abnormal findings  (were found, but dr. won't explain)
2. cylinder shaped object with air in it was visible on x-ray

received a odd phone call from head nurse seeing if i was ok after i was discharged.  she hinted around to request my medical records especially x-rays.
content.summary: A alf/man like thing came in my house ended up in my bedroom and did stuff to me.  i think i was either gasses or drugged

content.detailedDescription: Heading east on i10 outside anahuac towards winnie texas. saw one flashing light over i10 moving very fast large aircraft flying low yet unable to determine what it was. once lined up with interstate i saw a flashing light on each end of what could have been wings yet no other lights on craft. recorded some of craft yet could not get close enough
content.summary: Large aircraft flying very low very fast no lights wingspan of i10 at least

content.detailedDescription: I'm a supervisor for a shipyard that builds littoral combat ships for the us navy. at approximately 9:30 i saw what i thought was a helicopter or small plane following the menominee river from lake michigan and it had 2 blue extremely bright lights on each end of it it was just above the tree line by the time it got just about over me the whole bottom of it turned blue and it wasn't making a sound. i watched it until it went out of sight. there were several other people in the yard and around the dockside area that i know saw it. i got off work at 11:30 pm and was driving home and i saw it again over the north end of the city of menominee mi. it was actually descending  so i sped up to try to get a better look at it and it shot strait up and out of sight faster than anything i've ever seen so i know it was nothing from this area.
content.summary: It was following menominee river coming toward the navy ships.

content.detailedDescription: It shot out of nowhere it was a bright flash and then it vanished 3 seconds after it shot out it never came from opposite end of the sky
content.summary: It was a random white light that appeared in the sky out of nowhere literally and vanished 3 seconds after is was a really bright flash and it reminded me of what just happened in ca recently but it vanished in seconfs after it first popped out

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car. i was taking selfies and taking pictures all around since i am new to the area and i love taking mountains pics in the evening. so i took this pic unknownigly that i had captured ufo shuttle. i was really surprised to see this because i have never believed those things. i thought ghosts and ufo's are all same issues because there is no scientifically based info on them. after i saw this, i seriously believed in ufo. only thing i wonder, that no one else reported it or nothing came on news. anyways, secondly i will be posting two pictures. in second picture, i turned camera to selfie mode and took pic. it is blury but you all can see how that thing moved to a different direction. it's now behind me. i was about to delete these pictures but when i saw it,i had to keep these pictures and show these to friends and family. my husband would never believe me since he thinks its reflection of something. i keep taking pictures in the evening now in hope i will see it again.
content.summary: Ufo sighting by hollister

content.detailedDescription:
My neighbor just stopped by and left, returning to his home across the street.  i followed him home, left and was walking up his driveway towards my home. 
as i got to the end, i heard a observed a four seater airplane overhead, which was flying over the streetlight. completely visible, if it was day, i probably could have read the i'd letters and numbers on the plane.
immediately, i remember having seen another object up and off to my left. right above my neighbors house across the street. i just remembered seeing this before i had observed the plane.  which is why i looked up at the plane.  the plane was very loud, but the glowing red light,i noticed was silent. and the red light was coming closer and brighter. it was now about the size of a quarter or 50 cent piece. slowly, like a crawl, coming closer. i thought about my phone camera but did not have it....So, i quickly walked and pounder on my neighbor's door. he is a former vietnam doctor in the air force.  surely, i thought he would recognize this flying craft. in less than 45 seconds, we were both looking at this object which must have traveled 500 miles in the other direction.  it was red and was traveling like a leaf would, up and away, in a swirling wind.A single, long, lazy loop. this would be the second ufo i have ever seen.  the first time scared me, this one did not. there was also the color white inside the red glow and i remember it turning sideways, or just the bottom half turning, and seeing two long, what i guess were, landing legs. and then after it disappeared a plane with a red flashing light, far off in the distant, but in the same direction was observed and decided that we knew for sure that it was a plane. compared thar with what we both saw, wasn't even close.
content.summary: All at once

content.detailedDescription: I was down in bear lake on saturday talking to my wife on the phone at about 6:30 when something in the sky caught my attention - i saw what appeared to be a very bright satellite about 35-40 degrees above the horizon. it was about as bright as venus has looked next to the moon in the recent mornings. then i noticed two more lights to the right of it (about the same brightness as each other, though slightly dimmer than the first one i saw), forming something like a scalene triangle (thank you 5th grade math), with the brightest light in the back. three lights travelling same direction (southeast), same speed. after watching them for about 8-10 seconds, they all faded out far more quickly than i've ever seen a satellite fade, the first two fading at the same time, the third fading about a half of a second later. there was no sound that would have accompanied a plane and it wasn't moving fast enough to remain airborne if it was as close as it would have had to have been for the lights to be that far apart.
content.summary: Triangle lights like those in arizona and new mexico

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were taking our evening walk on november 9th 2015 at approximately 9:15 pm around our neighborhood and on our way back we were heading east on lacanto st. at app. 9 45 pm ...And about middway down lacanto we were looking to the left and seen something that appeared to be a bright orb and it seemed like it was coming from the ground up a high rate of speed and it didnt have any fire under it or around it and then like middway up in the sky it just went off or disappeared and we didnt  see it again after that. there was a neighbor walking his dog further down the road and he shouted to us did you see that..By the time we could respond he had disappeared into the darkness ..
content.summary: Bright white orb that shot straight upward and then just disappeared similar to an on off switch

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting watching tv when the large bluer than any blue i've ever seen caught my attention, i immediately ran out to my patio an witnessed the object and direction it was going. the object was extremely large and was traveling at an enormously high speed. i did notice that approximately 20 minutes later a helicopter did appear heading the direction of the object. my reaction was that of initial jaw dropping, but i have witnessed objects before and am always ready. i lost sight of the object as it moved with incredible speed.
content.summary: Large oject moved across the sky at an enormous speed, incredible blue glow with large blue glowing trail, not like a meteor but more like a blue cloud following it.
